name: Radio Rallye App
tagline: Navigation App for participants on Radio Rallye 2017 event
body:
# Radio Rallye App

This project was created for purpose of navigating participants of Radio Rallye 2017 event ,that will took place in Å½ilina/Slovakia.

## Main Goals
* Create mobile friendly application
* Allow to add multiple articles
* Allow notification
* Wrap application as "Native" in Android

## Current State
* Article support for Title,Main Title,Content and Google Maps with Routes and Markers - DONE
* Native/Web notifications - IN PROGRESS
* Youtube Video Support for Articles - PLANNED

## Used Technologies
* Spring Boot
* Spring JPA
* Spring Actuator

## Requirements
* For Windows(Local Development)
+ HSQLDB
* For Linux(Production)
+ MySql
